entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
